info.name: Report API Documentation
info.description: This API handles all requests for reports for different business aspects, such as sales, restaurants, drivers, etc. It allows for general summary reports or some individualized reports for restaurants and drivers.

query.description: set the timeframe for the report (day, week, month, year)
set the start date when the report begins
set the end date when the report ends

request.description: Retrieve a sales report which includes information such as total profit, total revenue, number of sales, etc. This can be filtered by a timeframe or a start date and end date.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: basic
Added as a part of security scheme: basic

request.description: let other services post raw sales data in batches

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: basic
Added as a part of security scheme: basic

query.description: set the timeframe for the report (day, week, month, year)
set the start date when the report begins
set the end date when the report ends

request.description: Retrieve an abandoned carts report for a user which includes information such as total count(of abandoned carts), id of the restaurant with the most abandoned carts, a list of commonly abandoned items, etc. This can be filtered by a timeframe or a start date and end date.

response.name: Successfully return a sales report for a user

request.description: Retrieve an abandoned carts report for a user which includes all previous information, but narrowed down to a specific user. This can be filtered by a timeframe, a start date and end date, and/or a user id.

response.name: Successfully return a sales report for a restaurant

request.description: Retrieve a transaction report which includes information such as the amount of money in pending/posted/declined transactions along with the actual number of pending/posted transactions. This can be filtered by a timeframe or a start date and end date.

query.description: set the timeframe for the report (day, week, month, year)
set the start date when the report begins
set the end date when the report ends
Set the metric to sort report by (profit, number of orders, tips)

request.description: Retrieve a driver activity report which includes all previous information, but narrowed down to the top driver of a given metric. This can be filtered by a timeframe, a start date and end date, and/or a metric. Given no metric, shows top driver for each metric.

response.name: Successfully return driver report for the top driver
